text: Exclusive: Trump ally Bernie Kerik meets with special counsel investigators  —  Donald Trump ally Bernie Kerik met Monday with special counsel Jack Smith's investigators who are handling the probe related to the 2020 election aftermath and the January 6, 2021, insurrection.
